title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS  There’s no need to bring a camera into the Vatican with this technology. Sometimes I think about becoming a pet groomer.  A reminder of art in nature. Let’s make some.  Layovers at these airports feel like vacations.  Praise be, Ina.  This sticker looks like it would be so fun.  Lego engagement ring box.  Oh man do I want pecan pie bars, My cranberry rosemary bars will do! I want to retreat here.  Time travel- Marilyn Monroe puts on Chanel No. 5 How to host Thanksgiving on a budget.  I don’t understand the appeal of a mystery bag at TJ’s.  All the discontinued McDonald’s items over the years.  The history behind the Uncrustable.  What are the most common pie crust problems? What are the most common passwords?  How do we feel about these peanut butter rankings? How to make an epic cheese board! Weekend Reading: Be Ready for When the Luck Happens Need to get started planning your holiday parties? Use my Party Planning list!  The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
text: Beth November 15, 2024 For the last 3 weeks, ads have covered the center portion of your list on Friday. This week it completely blocks items 10-13 from being read. Is there anything you can do about this? I try to close them, but t the box remains. Tracy November 15, 2024 oh no! what browser do you use to view my website? i am sorry that’s happening! Jamie November 15, 2024 I’ll definitely try the Kitchn pecan pie bars, but my go-to for years of enjoyment is the Martha’s Pecan Bars recipe on Martha Stewart – so good. So, so good. Heather November 15, 2024 I am surprised Crazy Richard’s peanut butter wasn’t in the running! It is sooo good! I agree with Ina 100% Happy Friday! Hilary November 16, 2024 Tracy, I can see what Beth is talking about. It’s happening in mobile if I click the link from your Instagram story and I stay within the instagram browser. There’s an ad that blocks list items 10-12. This doesn’t happen if I directly hit the URL through the Google app on my iPhone. —the add appears between list items 10 and 11. Leave a Comment
html:
• Beth November 15, 2024

    For the last 3 weeks, ads have covered the center portion of your list on Friday. This week it completely blocks items 10-13 from being read. Is there anything you can do about this? I try to close them, but t the box remains.

    • Tracy November 15, 2024

      oh no! what browser do you use to view my website? i am sorry that’s happening!

  • Jamie November 15, 2024

    I’ll definitely try the Kitchn pecan pie bars, but my go-to for years of enjoyment is the Martha’s Pecan Bars recipe on Martha Stewart – so good. So, so good.

  • Heather November 15, 2024

    I am surprised Crazy Richard’s peanut butter wasn’t in the running! It is sooo good!
    I agree with Ina 100% Happy Friday!

  • Hilary November 16, 2024

    Tracy, I can see what Beth is talking about. It’s happening in mobile if I click the link from your Instagram story and I stay within the instagram browser. There’s an ad that blocks list items 10-12. This doesn’t happen if I directly hit the URL through the Google app on my iPhone. —the add appears between list items 10 and 11.

Leave a Comment
